page.title: 06Farming-Ide Hill
page.content: { Goathurst Common Farms(Ltd)} Is an amalgamation of Brook Place, Chains and Great Norman Street farms run under a single management. Main activities include dairy and beef cattle, sheep, cereals and forestry. {Hatchlands}farm has a dairy herd. {Atherfolds, Bowzells & Old House } farms are concerned mainly with beef production. {Cordon's Farm}is given over to stabling horses. {Scallops(cereals) & Wickhurst Manor} farms are managed by the owner of Faulkener's Hill farm which is partly in the adjacent block. {Yorkshill}is a dairy farm of some 200 Friesian milking cows. The majority of the buildings are some 400m from the original farmhouse. The farm manager lives in a modern bungalow adjacent to the dairy and cattle sheds.
